verbose_text: In contrast, a long lasting decrease in the number of burst responses was induced when TBS was delivered in the presence of blockers of different types of mGluRs (XREF_FIG) : an mGluR1 antagonist (LY367385; n = 4, P < 0.01) for EB neurons and an mGluR5 antagonist (MPEP n = 4, P < 0.007) for LB neurons.
evidence: antagonist (LY367385; n = 4, P < 0.01) for EB neurons and an mGluR5
